doc:
Chris Farley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Farley 0 Christopher Crosby Farley (February 15, 1964 – December 18, 1997) was an American actor and comedian. Farley was known for his loud, energetic comedic style, and was a member of Chicago's Second City Theatre and later a cast member of the NBC sketch comedy show Saturday Night Live between 1990 and 1995. He then went on to pursue a film career, starring in films such as Tommy Boy, Black Sheep and Beverly Hills Ninja. Farley died of a drug overdose at the age of 33. Christopher_Crosby_Farley ( February_15_,_1964 – December_18_,_1997 ) was an_American_actor_and_comedian . Farley was_known for his_loud_,_energetic_comedic_style , and was a_member of Chicago 's_Second_City_Theatre and later a_cast_member of the_NBC_sketch_comedy show Saturday_Night_Live between 1990_and_1995 . He then went on to_pursue a_film_career , starring in films such_as Tommy_Boy , Black_Sheep and Beverly_Hills_Ninja . Farley died of a_drug_overdose at the_age of 33 .
